title: Breaking Down The Barriers: How Three Female Entrepreneurs Made It In Finance - Forbes
content: Breaking Down The Barriers: How Three Female Entrepreneurs Made It In Finance  Forbes
description: Finance is one of several industries where women have found it hard to rise to the top. Fintech may have shaken things up, but in terms of diversity, much remains to be done. On International Womenâ€™s Day, three leading female business leaders in finance share their experiences and their views.
